String.string: Ask Elleon if there is any replacement energy that can handle the Core.
Relate Elleon's message to Fraya in Castanica.
Deliver Sophilia's orders to Officer Karina at Avenger Outpost. [Use the {@linkcreature:61#1009#Teleportal} to go to Avenger Outpost.]
Go to Elleon near Avenger Outpost in the northwestern corner of the Hungry Caverns. [Speak with {@linkcreature:208#2000#Tadan} to go to Hungry Caverns Catacombs.]

Enter the Golden Labyrinth through the area near the closed door and speak with {@LinkCreature:3005#1001#Runshia}. [You must select Golden Labyrinth (Solo) from the {@LinkCreature:208#1501#Teleportal} to advance this quest.]
Speak with Jelena who's been scouting the area.
Use the western {@linkcreature:3005#1012#obelisk} to open the gate, then eliminate Berylheart.
Eliminate all the monsters past the Chamber of Trial and make your way through.
You have located Elleon. Go to Elleon and speak with him.
I'd be dead if it weren't for you.
Speak with Elleon and start protecting him.
Protect the teleportal in the Chamber of the Wild and eliminate Valgmore and Varcerbus.
Report to Elleon at the Chamber of the Wild.
Speak with Elleon in Chamber of the Wild again.
Speak with Elleon at Golden Labyrinth Entrance.
